isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - AIR CONDITIONING BASIC THEORY, SYSTEM DIAGNOSIS AND SERVICE (WITH R-12 REFRIGERANT SYSTEM) - SPECIAL SERVICE TOOLS - ELECTRONIC LEAK DETECTOR

svcproc.title: ELECTRONIC LEAK DETECTOR
svcproc.para: OEM-1437 detects leaks in both the R-12 and HFC-134A air conditioning systems through a 100 per cent solid state electronic circuitry ( Figure 27). A unique LED warns if batteries are low and calibration is accomplished without the usual inconvenient external reference leak source. An audio leak indicator ensures efficient operation even in bright sunlight. Disposable paper filters help prevent sensing tip from becoming clogged with grease. The power source is two (2) C-size alkaline flashlight batteries.
